hero.title: AI Integration & Consulting for Modern Businesses
hero.subtitle: From custom chatbots to intelligent automation, we bring cutting-edge AI to your workflows.

services.title: Custom AI Chatbots
services.description: Build intelligent chatbots for customer support, HR, e-commerce, and internal knowledge bases using a modern tech stack like LangChain and OpenAI.

services.title: Workflow Automation
services.description: Automate repetitive tasks like email replies, document summarization, and report generation by connecting powerful language models to your tools.

services.title: AI-Driven Document Search
services.description: Enable your team to upload and ask questions about PDFs, Word files, and other documents using powerful RAG-based systems.

services.title: AI for Audio/Video
services.description: Leverage AI for tasks like transcription, meeting summarization, podcast summarization, and video highlight generation using tools like Whisper.

services.title: AI for E-Commerce
services.description: Boost your business with AI-powered product description generators, review summarizers, dynamic FAQ bots, and personalized recommendation systems.

services.title: AI Consulting
services.description: We help businesses understand where AI can fit into their systems and build Proof-of-Concepts (PoCs) to prove value.

faq.question: What kind of businesses do you work with?
faq.answer: We work with businesses of all sizes, from startups to large enterprises. Our solutions are tailored to your specific needs, whether you’re looking for a simple chatbot or a complex automation system.

faq.question: How long does a typical project take?
faq.answer: Project timelines vary depending on the scope and complexity. A simple chatbot might take a few weeks, while a comprehensive automation could take a few months. We provide a detailed timeline during the consultation phase.

faq.question: Do I need to have a technical background?
faq.answer: Not at all! We handle all technical aspects and guide you through every step of the process in a non-technical way.

faq.question: Can you integrate AI solutions with our existing tools?
faq.answer: Yes, our AI solutions can be seamlessly integrated with your existing workflows, CRMs, and internal tools.

faq.question: What is the cost of your AI services?
faq.answer: Our pricing depends on the project’s scope and complexity. We offer flexible packages to suit different budgets and needs.

faq.question: Do you offer ongoing support after the project?
faq.answer: Yes, we provide post-deployment support and maintenance to ensure your AI systems continue to run smoothly.

faq.question: Can you handle sensitive business data securely?
faq.answer: Absolutely. We follow strict security practices to ensure your business data remains private and protected.

testimonials.name: Sarah Thompson
testimonials.feedback: Nyxus.ai transformed our customer support with an AI chatbot that handles 80% of incoming queries. Game-changer!

testimonials.name: James Carter
testimonials.feedback: Their workflow automation saved us hundreds of hours every month. Highly recommended!

blogFallback.title: The Future of AI in Business
blogFallback.excerpt: AI is reshaping industries — here’s how companies can adapt.
